tool_description: An online scoreboard and leaderboard system
name: Keepthescore.com
title: Keepthescore.com

api_list.name: score_api_populate_board
api_list.description:
This will **delete all players** and scores and replace them with the new data.

If you are not using teams, you can omit the team field.

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: The token of the board to populate.

api_list.name: score_api_add_player

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: The token of the board to add the player to

api_list.name: score_api_create_team

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: The token of the board for which the team is created.

api_list.name: score_api_add_round
api_list.description: The "goal" field is optional and only used for goal trackers.

api_list.name: score_api_add_score
api_list.description:
Currently only works for leaderboards, score sheets, counters or goal trackers.
The "goal" field is optional and only used for goal trackers.
